long_description: You might be tough. You might be handsome. The Momentum Steelix watch is both. Enjoy its high-end toughness, rugged good looks and reliable performance-all at a surprisingly affordable price. Classic analog dial with luminous hands and markers features accurate, long-life quartz movement; it's timeless, yet keeps perfect time. Tough steel case and screw-down crown maintain water resistance to 200m (660 ft.). Hardened mineral crystal resists scratches and impact. The Momentum Steelix watch features a breathable and durable nylon webbing band.
short_description: You might be tough. You might be handsome. The Momentum Steelix watch is both. Enjoy its high-end toughness, rugged good looks and reliable performance-all at a surprisingly affordable price.
